name: SuperNom Adventure
description:
This is a submission for protoplay 2020.

The game is about the adventure of SuperNom (Hyper Casual Genre)

How to play:

Move supernom by using your mouse (this is to simulate the touch control on smartphone)

The goal of each level is basically to collect the candies and go to the blue portal.

If you failed the level, there will be a Continue button and Restart button (will be available after 2 seconds).

Currently, there are only 5 levels for this protoplay submit.

Can you beat all the levels without dying? :)
